question:
Which of the following statements about Dadabhai Naoroji is/ are correct?
1. He became Prime Minister of Baroda in 1874
2. He was a member of the Indian National Association
3. He was a professor of Elphinstone College in Bombay
4. He was a member of the Conservative Party of United Kingdom
Choose the correct option from the codes given below :
explanation: Dadabhai Naoroji was born in Gujarat in a Parsi family. He became Prime Minister of Baroda in 1874. He was a member of the Indian National Association founded by Surendranath Banerjee and Ananda Mohan Bose in the year 1876. He was appointed as a professor (Mathematics and Natural Philosophy) at the Elphinstone College in Bombay in 1855. He was a member of the Liberal Party of the United Kingdom and won the election and became the first British Indian MP in 1892.
